meanings.definition: A distilled alcoholic beverage originating in Japan.
meanings.sent1: I tried a new brand of shochus at the Japanese restaurant.
meanings.sent2: In Japan, many people enjoy sipping on shochus during social gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over a bottle of shochus, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of shochus filled the room, transporting me back to my vacation in Japan.
meanings.sent5: The clear liquid of shochus sparkled under the dim lights of the bar.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed various types of shochus available for purchase.
meanings.sent2: At the store, I bought a few bottles of different shochus to try with friends.
meanings.sent3: During the party, guests debated which shochus tasted the best with their snacks.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with colorful bottles of shochus, each with a unique label.
meanings.sent5: The group decided to sample all the shochus before voting on their favorite.
